info.name: Black Transparent Theme for SinaWeibo V0.4.1
info.description:
A black translate theme for sina weibo with new style. 

新浪微博的黑色透明主题
info.additionalInfo:
V0.3: Change almost every page except the personal "focus" "focused" "weibo" page. Because the css of sina has some inherit  problems in those pages. The App pages haven't changed yet because I don't use(maybe update later). Colors are my own favourite.
V0.3: 修改了整个新浪微博的视觉效果。个人的“关注”“粉丝”“微博”三个页面由于新浪的css的继承问题所以还在研究如何修改。应用页面也没有改变，因为本人并不使用的关系（未来可能更新）。

V0.4: Change the word color in the right nav on homepage.
V0.4: 调整了主页右栏的文字颜色。

V0.4.1: Update the new wbim status bar into black transparent; Update the new announcement in the right nav bar into black transparent; Change the color of the horizontal nav bar in "how to play weibo".
V0.4.1: 更新即时聊天窗口的状态栏样式； 更新了主页右栏新增的公告栏样式； 调整了“怎样玩转微博”中横向状态栏的背景色。

V0.4.2：This is the last version. No updates for future. Because a new theme is making. And Sina is very poor in classes and id and software engineering, so no updates in the future. Fix some font color.
V0.4.2：这是最后一个版本啦。未来不再更新。一个新的主题在制作中。鉴于新浪微博前段经常改定义名的关系，不再进行大更新啦。修复一些字体颜色显示问题。

You can change your background with your own background url in the css which is in the body{}. 
你可以在css的body{}段中使用你自己的图片地址定义自己的背景图片。

 If you have problems with this css, you can send email to killerallen7@gmail.com.
如果你对此css有任何问题，都可以发邮件到killerallen7@gmail.com。
